Type: Late Game Push

Icreases Shrine of Azshara and Gorgon mana by 10%. Unlocks upgrades for them inside this building. Reduces cooldowns of defensive Shrine spells by 30%.

Type: Magic Power / Base Defence

Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 4 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

Reduces spell damage to buildings by 90%.
Has Global Silence and Mana Leak Aura.

Type: Anti Ultimate Weapon

No, seriously, we do hate them!

+10% attack rate

Buildings:
+1 armor

Upgrades:
+3Lv Unit Armor

Blizzard (90 damage in 225 AoE)

Traits: Jacks of all trades but masters of none. Very basic and simple, but versatile and adaptive. Good in every situation, foolproof and idiotfriendly. Easy to play and very boring. Recomended for total Noobs.

Difficulty: Beginer

Units:
+2 armor
-10% attack rate

Buildings:
+10% hit points

Traits: What they lack in magic and spells, Dwarves make it up in their ingenuity. Weak starting units, but powerful late game mechanical contraptions that are resistant to almost all magic effects.

Difficulty: Advanced

+10% attack rate
-4 armor

Orc

+20% damage

Troll

Units:
+5% evasion
-5% hit points

Buildings:
+10% attack rate

Upgrades:
+3Lv Ranged Weapons

Traits: Why so serious? Come and have a smoke with us! Fragile in early game, unpredictable in late game. Debilitates and confuses enemy. You won't win all games, but you will have fun in every single one.

Difficulty: Skilled

Tauren

Units:
+10% hit points
+1 HP/sec regeneration
-10% attack rate

Buildings:
+20% damage

Upgrades:
+3Lv Melee Weapons

Traits: Slow and steady wins the race! It is not about dealing damage, its about outliving enemy. Damage output rises slowly and peaks in late game. It depends on brute force and so cannot be denied or dispelled.

Difficulty: Advanced

-30% buy cost
-5% hit points

Buildings:
+10% attack rate

Upgrades:
